item.title: Pathtracer Devlog
item.description: This post is a devlog for my pathtracer-playground project. Follow along to see the progress, starting from scratch by opening a simple window. Hello, bounding volume hierarchies 2023-11-02 Commit: 624e5ea This entry marks the first step towards being able to shoot rays at complex triangle geometry. A bounding volume hierarchy (BVH) is introduced (common/bvh.hpp) and tested. The test (tests/bvh.cpp) intersects rays with the BVH, and uses a brute-force test against the full array of triangles as the ground truth.
